search_results.title: Swimmer
search_results.lyrics:
Swimmer Lyrics[Verse 1]
The sun has hardly warmed the water when it crashes on the sand
You hoped it would be warmer, you say, pulling out your hand
The warmer waters get the more the oceans expand
You told me first and then I didn't really understand

[Verse 2]
If I could turn back time
I would and I’d be good
I would always be kind
To you
To you
[Verse 3]
You say "Look at this, the world still spins and beauty will never go
It was there before and will be there more when there’s no I to behold"

[Verse 4]
How suitable, you the buoy, you arms like silver fins
Your head afloat the golden glow of waves crashing in

[Verse 5]
If I could make this last
Take more of this moment
Trade in some of my past
You swim
You swim
You in it all, and letting it all inYou might also likeEmbed

song.embed_content: Read “Swimmer” by Helena Deland on Genius
song.title: Swimmer

search_results.title: Baby
search_results.lyrics:
Baby Lyrics[Verse 1]
Take off your wig
Oh, let me stare
I'll keep un-cross-dressing you no matter where
Paint my nails
And when they’re dry
Undo my hair, you're taking me out for a drive

[Chorus]
Ooh, I can live without
You but I forgot
'Cause you’re so baby
[Verse 2]
Take me upstairs
Let's go get down
And if I don't know the tune I'll dance around
'Cause you've got ways, you've got ways
You've got ways, you’ve got ways
You’ve got ways I haven't seen on anyone

[Chorus]
Ooh, I can live without
You but I forgot
’Cause you're so baby
Ooh, I can live without
You but I forgot
'Cause you're so baby

[Outro]
You’ve got ways I haven't, and ways I haven't, no-o-o-oh
You've got ways I haven't, and ways I haven't, no-o-o-oh
You've got ways I haven't, and ways I haven't
And ways I haven't, no-o-o-o-o-oh
You've got ways I haven't seen on anyoneYou might also like1Embed

search_results.title: Claudion
search_results.lyrics:
Claudion Lyrics[Verse 1]
I broke into our home
Had we even been living here all along?
And I forget who I'm with
All I remember is trying to get here safe

[Pre-Chorus]
And your face that I know
And your face that I know says

[Chorus]
"Night falls
And day breaks"
I was only thinking 'bout trying it out
I was only thinking 'bout trying it out
[Verse 2]
I break into our place
Step back and take a look at what has changed
And when I turn around I see you lying on the ground, it's you
When I go down as myself, I don't come up as someone else, it's true

[Pre-Chorus]
And your face that I know
And your face that I know says

[Bridge]
"What comes over you
When you wish you were somewhere else?
I can look after you
But, girl, you should look after yourself"

[Chorus]
"'Cause night falls
And day breaks"
I was only thinking 'bout trying it out
I was only thinking 'bout trying it out

[Outro]
When night falls and I'm all thinking 'bout trying it out
And day breaks, and I can't help it, I can't help it
Day breaks and I can't help it, breaksYou might also like1Embed

search_results.title: Truth Nugget
search_results.lyrics:
Truth Nugget Lyrics[Verse 1]
You shed all your layers and become a truth nugget
You're my desperately open boy
You say you can't hold anything back, it's a habit
You say what's on your mind, mm
Whatever's on your mind, mm

[Refrain]
Now you haven't got anything on, it's a habit
That dies hard, dies hard
[Chorus]
Watch me do my makeup and hair
While you make up hypotheses out of thin air
I am another solid mystery when it comes to you
Michael, I'm the puzzle in the other room

[Post-Chorus]
Mm
Mm
Mm

[Verse 2]
Mountain park, the gate where you stand guard and spread a blanket
So you have it
In case I come around
Festively clothed, we'll shed layers and expose the naked
Landscapes of our minds
We'll crack open our minds

[Refrain]
I am one to keep everything on, it's a habit
That dies hard

[Chorus]
Watch me do my makeup and hair (Dies hard)
While you make up hypotheses out of thin air (Dies hard)
I am another solid mystery when it comes to you (Dies hard)
Michael, I'm the puzzle in the other room (Mm)
Watch me do my makeup and hair (Mm)
While you make up hypotheses out of thin air (Mm)
I am another solid mystery when it comes to you (Mm)
Michael, I'm the puzzle in the other room
You might also like[Outro]
(Mm)Embed

song.embed_content: Read “Truth Nugget” by Helena Deland on Genius
song.title: Truth Nugget

annotations: Watch me do my makeup and hair

The speaker is putting up a physical barrier between herself Michael – the makeup – as well as an emotional one by keeping more of her thoughts to herself, essentially keeping her true self a mystery to him.

search_results.title: Someone New
search_results.lyrics:
Someone New Lyrics[Intro]
If I could have every thought
As though for the first time
I'd never get sick of
The patterns of my mind
But I am stuck
I am stuck

[Chorus]
If things go my way
I'll stay in this room
Where tonight I want to lay
Kissing someone new
With a familiar face
I can't replace
Because remembering, no
It hasn't been enough
It's like the partial glow
A bright flower gives off
At night
Color imprecise
[Verse 1]
What if I told you
It'll all just end the same?
And then I turned to you
Showed you my game
You'd believe I'm stuck
'Til I get ahold of

[Verse 2]
A stranger to remind me
I don't contain the world
It is outside, can't I see?
And in it, I'm this lucky girl
And how to play my role
'Til I get too old

[Verse 3]
By then remembering, oh
It better be enough
I'll be covered head to toe
In the faded flower patterns of
Memories
Of nights like these
Of good times passed
I'll be home at last
You might also like[Bridge]
And I will give
Myself a fucking break

[Chorus]
If things go my way
I'll stay in this room
Where again I want to lay
Kissing someone new
Who tells me
Something pretty
So that I, too
Can feel like someone newEmbed

search_results.title: Comfort, Edge
search_results.lyrics:
Comfort, Edge Lyrics[Intro]
I can never know for sure just what you do  (So much later, I've gotten used to your sheets)
Unless I stick around and see it through  (It wakes me up, I can't sleep, and so I reach for)
It doesn't ever matter what you say  (A tall glass of water)
It always ends up going either way (Sip at it watch you dream, and all the secrets you keep, they make me wonder)

[Pre-Chorus]
No, you'll never make a fool of me
No, you'll never make a fool of me

[Chorus]
You'll make it so
It's easy for me to get away from you
Without me having to tell you
Where I go or what I do
And all the while protecting and giving me security
I never have to doubt when I come back
You'll still be there for me
[Post-Chorus]
Give me comfort, give me edge
Make it easy, make me beg
Let me come for calm and peace
Never stop surprising me

[Verse]
I see your face in the mirror
As it puts on the expression
It only has in reflections
And I know, I'm scared of going further
Into what you choose to show me
A trail of hints I can't see:
You'll fuck me over

[Pre-Chorus]
You'll never make a fool of me
No, you'd never make a fool of me

[Chorus]
You'll make it so
It's easy for me to get away from you
Without me having to tell you
Where I go or what I do
And all the while protecting and giving me security
I never have to doubt when I come back
You'll still be there for me
You might also like[Post-Chorus]
Give me comfort, give me edge
Make it easy, make me beg
Let me come for calm and peace
Never stop surprising me

[Outro]
I can never know for sure just what you do
Unless I stick around and see it through
It doesn't ever matter what you say
It always ends up going either wayEmbed

search_results.title: Pale
search_results.lyrics:
Pale Lyrics[Verse 1]
Spending this much time
In my naked body’s
Not making it familiar to me
Trying to get used to it
I read what's on me
See-through blue’s the colour
True love leaves in tiny

[Chorus]
Marks, gone so soon
Quiet stars in mid-afternoon
Pale
[Verse 2]
“It doesn’t make me feel young”
I say “It’s something more motherly”
I’ll leave in his arms if it’s not I who has to carry
When the night rolls in
A tongue that holds me softly
I'll melt into sleep
And then am told a different story

[Chorus]
In dreams gone so soon
Roaring streams taking me to you
Pale
Pale
Pale
Pale
GoneYou might also likeEmbed

search_results.full_title: Take It All by Helena Deland
search_results.title: Take It All
search_results.lyrics:
Take It All Lyrics[Verse 1]
I couldn’t help it, no
I made it up
The life I danced in
And could get enough
I couldn’t help it, no
I wondered who let you call them "baby"
I wondered who let you call them "baby"
You do have a way with the ladies

[Chorus]
Take it all
Bring it back to my bed
Take it all
Nothing needs to be said
Take it all
I’ll use the space it frees up in my head
For thoughts of you to spread
[Verse 2]
I couldn’t help it, no
I came back
Saying "if it’s a cruel game
Well, I came to know
If I’d met my match"
I wasn’t playing though
Holding you close I froze in motion
Holding you close I froze in motion
Now I can’t wait to join the commotion

[Pre-Chorus]
It isn’t easy
It isn’t easy as a friend
To pretend you can

[Chorus]
Take it all
Bring it back to my bed
Take it all
Like nothing needs to be said
Take it all
I’ll use the space it frees up in my head
For thoughts of you to spreadYou might also likeEmbed

description.plain:
Discographie – Année 2020

Cette page a pour but de recenser au maximum les albums, EPs, mixtapes et maxis de pop et rock québécois (ou du Canada français) sortis et prévus pour l'année 2020.


Chaque album annoté précédé d'un tiret cadratin (—) est complet et disponible sur le site en cliquant sur le nom de l'album, ou en cliquant directement sur un titre particulier.
Chaque album annoté précédé d'un astérisque (*) est un album à compléter.





Remarque : Pour effectuer une recherche spécifique sur un artiste ou un projet en particulier sur la page, faites CTRL+F. Il est aussi possible de naviguer par mois en utilisant le calendrier au haut de la page.

body.plain:
Discographie – Année 2020

Cette page a pour but de recenser au maximum les albums, EPs, mixtapes et maxis de pop et rock québécois (ou du Canada français) sortis et prévus pour l'année 2020.


Chaque album annoté précédé d'un tiret cadratin (—) est complet et disponible sur le site en cliquant sur le nom de l'album, ou en cliquant directement sur un titre particulier.
Chaque album annoté précédé d'un astérisque (*) est un album à compléter.





Remarque : Pour effectuer une recherche spécifique sur un artiste ou un projet en particulier sur la page, faites CTRL+F. Il est aussi possible de naviguer par mois en utilisant le calendrier au haut de la page.

search_results.title: Lylz
search_results.lyrics:
Lylz Lyrics[Verse 1]
Lylz, you don’t need to worry
We’ve got this
I’ve got my driver’s license
And you will need to practice
We’ll leave on the sly
Blasting the Boulanger sisters
And if one of us dies
The other will make sure
Her life’s work goes down in history
[Chorus]
You’ll be famous
For burning
With desire
For everything

[Verse 2]
I don’t need to worry we’ve got this
I’m feeling isolated
And you’ve got all the gossip
Come over make face masks
Death masks
For future reference
A statue will smirk at tourists
Sitting on park benches

[Verse 3]
Lylz, let’s get out of here
Yeah, we’ve had it
It’s all smoke and mirrors
The time has come for us to vanish
Burn the bridge to this world
Of terrifying uncertainty
Step on it, hurl us into
Worthwhile mystery
You might also like[Chorus]
You’ll be famous
For burning
And I’ll be known for
My taste in choosing
Who’s light mine burns out next to
Who I warm my life to
For everythingEmbed

song.embed_content: Read “Lylz” by Helena Deland on Genius
song.title: Lylz

annotations:
Blasting the Boulanger sisters
 And if one of us dies
 The other will make sure
 Her life’s work goes down in history

The Boulanger sisters were French and came from a musical family. The older of the sisters, Nadia, was a composer for a short period of time but was most well known for being a music composition teacher. The younger of the sisters, Lili, was a well respected composer but died at 24 from tuberculosis. After Lili’s death Nadia spent the rest of her life promoting her sister’s work.
